content.description:
Start on the west face at the obvious arete and work up and then left onto the north side finishing up the arete. Fairly secure moves at the finish but a large rock sits directly under the landing.

This problem isn't listed in the Joshua Tree Bouldering Guide but is an obvious line with some good moves that's worth a go when in the area.
content.location:
Northwest arete of the boulder and right of

Forged in Fire

.

content.description:
SDS on a small rock at the base at opposing sidepulls and then work incut edges up and left moving onto the arete proper. Once standing work back right via a balancy high-step move and then mantle up onto a shelf below the top. A quick reach and easy mantle caps off the problem.

This problem isn't listed in the Joshua Tree Bouldering Guide but is an obvious line with some good moves that's worth a go when in the area.
content.location: The northeast arete of the boulder.

content.description:
Start below the lip on some good flakes and then crank up and over the lip into an easy but scary mantle. Best not to fall on this one. Descend by jumping back across to a rock.

This problem isn't listed in the Joshua Tree Bouldering Guide but is an obvious line with some good moves that's worth a go when in the area.

This alternate stand start to

Strength of Steel

begins on the other side of the arete by grabbing high crystals and then working up and right, turning the arete and finishing as for

Strength of Steel

.

This problem isn't listed in the Joshua Tree Bouldering Guide but is an obvious line with some good moves that's worth a go when in the area.
content.location:
Just around and left from

Strength of Steel

.

content.description:
Stem off a boulder on the right to reach a good sidepull, toe onto the rock and then reach for a good flat edge. Match the edge, get your feet up then go for the incut lip. Fun moves and much easier than it looks.

This problem isn't listed in the Joshua Tree Bouldering Guide but is an obvious line with some good moves that's worth a go when in the area.
content.location: Just right of center and a prominent black streak on the north face.
